1644190.name: IsoCubes
1644190.description:
Get ready to challenge your mind with IsoCubes, a captivating isometric puzzle game where precision and strategy are key. Your goal is simple: push the green starred cubes onto their matching target cubes. But don’t be fooled by the simplicity! Each level introduces new cube mechanics that will put your puzzle-solving skills to the test.

You'll start by selecting and moving blue cubes, which in turn push the green cubes in the desired direction. But beware—if a wrong cube is moved onto a target or a cube falls off the platform, it’s game over. Later levels will introduce new twists, like purple cubes that spawn additional green cubes and conveyor belts that transport your cubes to new locations. You’ll also have to navigate different elevations, moving cubes up and down to reach their goals.

With 46 increasingly challenging puzzles, IsoCubes keeps you engaged as you unlock new mechanics and strategies. Each completed level rewards you with an achievement, and the entire game is fully playable with a controller for a smooth, immersive experience.

Key Features:

  • 46 thoughtfully designed puzzles, each more challenging than the last.

  • Unique cube mechanics including spawning, conveyor belts, and elevation changes.

  • Simple, intuitive controls that allow for easy gameplay with a controller.

  • Achievements for each completed level, giving a sense of accomplishment.

  • Isometric design that adds depth and complexity to every puzzle.

Whether you're a casual gamer looking for a relaxing yet engaging experience or a puzzle enthusiast seeking a new challenge, IsoCubes offers the perfect blend of strategy and fun. Can you master all the puzzles and guide the cubes to victory?

Play IsoCubes today and start sharpening your mind with these exciting puzzles!
1644190.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 保加利亚语, 捷克语, 丹麦语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 希腊语, 匈牙利语, 日语, 韩语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 简体中文, 瑞典语, 泰语, 繁体中文, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 越南语
